TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HostedTransportConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供裝載於 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) 之傳輸實作的傳輸特定組態。

span.span: Provides transport-specific configuration for transport implementations hosted in Windows Process Activation Service (WAS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援使用 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) 之處理序啟用的傳輸，會使用 WAS 站台繫結來儲存傳輸正在上面接聽之網路位址的相關資訊。Transports that support process activation using the Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) use WAS site bindings to store information about the network addresses on which the transport is listening. 此傳輸實作會負責從 ApplicationHost.config 檔案讀取這項資訊，並負責建構可傳遞到 之建構函式 (Constructor) 的基底位址 (Base Address) URI 集合。The transport implementation is responsible for reading this information from the ApplicationHost.config file and for constructing a set of base address URIs that can then be passed to the constructor of . 負責建構這些基底位址的處理序屬於傳輸通訊協定特有。The process by which these base addresses are constructed is transport protocol specific. 支援 WAS 啟用的傳輸實作，必須提供衍生自 的實作來封裝這項邏輯。Implementations of a transport that support WAS activation must provide an implementation that derives from to encapsulate this logic. 如需有關使用這個類別，請參閱[UDP 啟用](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/udp-activation.md)範例，示範如何建立要由 WAS 啟用自訂的使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP)。For more information about the use of this class, see the [UDP Activation](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/udp-activation.md) sample, which demonstrates how to create a custom user datagram protocol (UDP) to be activated by WAS.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Uri[] GetBaseAddresses(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetBaseAddresses (virtualPath As String) As Uri()

span.span: The virtual path to the service.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，擷取主機的基底位址。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the base address of the host.

returns.span: 包含主機之基底位址的 。

span.span: The that contains the base address of the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用這個類別，請參閱[UDP 啟用](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/udp-activation.md)範例，示範如何建立要由 WAS 啟用自訂的使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP)。For more information about the use of this class, see the [UDP Activation](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/udp-activation.md) sample, which demonstrates how to create a custom user datagram protocol (UDP) to be activated by WAS.
